Change the order of common choices

1 In the Common Choices folder, double-click the name of the list you want to modify.

2 To change the position of an item on the list, click it in the Common Choices box and then click the or button.

Use the or buttons to move the item to the top or bottom of the list.

3 To sort the items in alphabetical order, click ABC.

4 To save the list and continue working, click Apply.

5 To print the list, click Print.

6 When you are finished, click OK.
